Title: Ticket AI Assist Agent
Snippet: Ticket AI Assist streamlines ticket management by classifying, summarizing, and drafting email responses, enhancing efficiency, accuracy for customer satisfaction.
Long_description:
Ticket AI Assist is an AI-powered solution that streamlines the entire ticket management lifecycle, helping enterprises boost accuracy, speed, and customer satisfaction. The demo highlights how the platform intelligently processes support tickets from intake to resolution, minimizing manual effort for service teams.

The assistant automatically classifies tickets by issue type and directly routes them to the right resolver groups or SMEs. It then summarizes key details, giving teams instant context, and provides actionable insights that guide investigation and resolution. To accelerate communication, Ticket AI Assist drafts response emails aligned with SOPs and best practices, which agents can quickly review and send. It also identifies similar tickets from past cases, enabling faster, more consistent resolutions.

The demo showcases real-world workflows such as metadata errors or account access issues being detected, triaged, resolved, and communicated back to users — complete with ready-to-send email drafts. By automating repetitive processes, Ticket AI Assist frees up human agents to focus on more complex problems, improving SLA adherence and overall productivity.

For organizations, this means smoother operations, higher accuracy in issue handling, and stronger customer satisfaction through AI-driven support efficiency.

Title: Email AI Agent
Snippet: Summarize and draft responses to customer support emails using LLMs
Long_description:
The Email AI Agent is designed to transform how enterprises handle customer support emails by leveraging the power of generative AI. The demo showcases how the assistant can quickly interpret complex customer queries, summarize key issues, and generate professional draft responses — significantly reducing turnaround time for support teams.

When a customer email is received, the AI automatically extracts the core details and generates a clear summary with action items, ensuring nothing is missed. It identifies urgent concerns, highlights next steps, and organizes the information in a structured way for easy follow-up. At the same time, the agent creates a ready-to-send draft response that is aligned with the company’s tone and service standards. Agents can then review, edit if necessary, and send the response — saving hours of manual effort across repetitive support tasks.

The demo illustrates real-world use cases such as delayed parcel deliveries or redirection requests, where the AI not only outlines the customer’s issues but also suggests precise follow-up actions. By automating both summarization and drafting, the Email AI Agent empowers service teams to handle higher volumes, reduce resolution times, and deliver more consistent customer experiences.

Title: Clinical Trials API Agent
Snippet: Answer questions from relevant clinical trials from ClinicalTrials.gov using LLMs
Long_description:
Trial Intel is designed to revolutionize how pharma teams access and apply clinical trial insights by harnessing the power of AI and real-time data. The demo showcases how the assistant can interpret complex business questions, query the ClinicalTrials.gov API, and deliver evidence-backed answers in seconds — helping teams craft data-driven, personalized messaging with ease.

When a question is asked, the AI identifies the intent, translates it into a structured query, and maps study relationships using a dynamic graph. It then presents a clear, contextualized answer supported by trial citations, ensuring credibility and precision. Whether it’s highlighting unique clinical endpoints, comparing therapy outcomes, or tracking post-launch safety data, the agent delivers actionable insights aligned with commercial and medical needs.

The demo illustrates real-world use cases such as developing promotional campaigns, building competitive sales narratives, tailoring marketing by biomarkers or demographics, and monitoring real-world evidence post-launch. By automating data interpretation and insight generation, Trial Intel empowers pharma teams to save time, reduce complexity, and create impactful, evidence-based engagement strategies.

Title: Metadata AI Agent
Snippet: AI-powered tool that validates, corrects, and optimizes metadata for accuracy and efficiency
Long_description:
Metadata AI Assist is designed to transform how enterprises manage and validate metadata by leveraging the power of AI. This intelligent assistant automates the process of checking, correcting, and enriching metadata, ensuring higher accuracy, consistency, and efficiency across datasets.

When metadata is uploaded, the assistant automatically validates entries against predefined rules, detecting inconsistencies, missing fields, or incorrect formats. It then provides AI-driven suggestions for corrections and improvements, along with clear explanations for each validation result, so users understand not just what to fix, but why. Corrected values can be quickly saved and applied, reducing repetitive manual work and the risk of human error.

Beyond validation, Metadata AI Assist serves as a quality-control partner by pinpointing issues early and offering proactive insights that enhance downstream processes like searchability, analytics, and compliance. This leads to streamlined workflows, reduced operational costs, and improved trust in data-driven decisions.

The demo illustrates real-world applications such as large-scale content operations, digital publishing, and enterprise data management. By automating both error detection and resolution, Metadata AI Assist empowers teams to maintain clean, reliable metadata—unlocking efficiency, scalability, and smarter use of information assets.

Title: Investor Ops AI
Snippet: Transform emails into action with AI-driven classification, summarization, and intelligent response generation.
Long_description:
Email Assist AI is designed to transform how enterprises handle customer and operational emails by leveraging large language models (LLMs) for classification, summarization, and intelligent response generation. The tool simplifies email-heavy workflows by automatically analyzing incoming messages, extracting key details, and categorizing them according to business rules.

When an email arrives, the assistant instantly identifies intent, classifies the message into the right category, and highlights urgent or priority items. It then generates a concise summary of the content, ensuring that no critical information is overlooked. In addition, the system can draft professional responses aligned with enterprise tone and compliance guidelines, enabling agents to respond faster and more consistently.

The platform also supports advanced features such as auto-assignment to relevant teams or agents, reducing manual triage and improving turnaround times. For customer service and operations teams, this means less time spent on repetitive tasks and more focus on high-value interactions.

Real-world use cases include financial services operations, investor relations, and customer support teams managing high volumes of complex inbound queries. By automating classification, summarization, and response generation, Email Assist AI empowers organizations to scale communications efficiently, reduce errors, and deliver faster, more personalized experiences to stakeholders.

Title: Research Agent
Snippet: Automate research and data integration—no coding, just smart API-driven insights.
Long_description:
Research Agent is designed to streamline and automate the way enterprises query and integrate scholarly and operational data from multiple APIs. By leveraging LLM-powered intelligence, it eliminates the need for manual API coding, enabling both technical and non-technical users to access, analyze, and combine information seamlessly.

The tool connects to diverse sources like CrossRef, OpenAlex, GitHub, StackOverflow, Google Analytics, and Google Workspace, providing a unified interface to query real-time information. Users can simply ask natural language questions, and the agent translates them into API calls, retrieves accurate results, and organizes responses into actionable insights.

With Research Agent, teams can:

Access real-time data across repositories and platforms without writing code.

Automate repetitive research tasks, saving hours of manual effort.

Integrate information across different APIs to support publishing, operations, and competitive analysis.

Prototype and test API interactions quickly, accelerating development cycles.

Business users can leverage it to monitor trends, benchmark competitors, and gather intelligence without technical expertise, while developers can use it to reduce boilerplate coding and streamline workflows.

By combining natural language queries with powerful API integration, Research Agent empowers organizations to unlock smarter, faster, and more scalable research and operational insights.

Title: Penn Foster AI Chat Audit
Snippet: AI that audits every customer chat, ensuring quality, compliance, and real-time agent training.
Long_description:
AI Chat Audit is designed to revolutionize customer service quality evaluation by using AI to automatically review and assess agent–customer interactions. Instead of relying on manual sampling—which often misses key insights—this tool evaluates 100% of chat conversations, ensuring no gaps in feedback or training opportunities.

The system works by uploading chat transcripts, which are then analyzed in real time with LLM-powered intelligence. It assesses the quality of agent responses, checks adherence to guidelines, and highlights both strengths and areas for improvement. The tool can even train agents on the fly, offering instant coaching and actionable recommendations.

Key features include:

Automated evaluation of customer service chats for quality and compliance.

Performance benchmarking to identify high-performing agents and training needs.

Continuous learning, allowing service teams to adapt and improve with every interaction.

Scalable analysis, reviewing large volumes of chats quickly and consistently.

By eliminating the bottleneck of manual reviews, AI Chat Audit empowers customer service leaders to drive efficiency, consistency, and higher satisfaction levels. Organizations can ensure that every interaction meets quality standards, while agents benefit from continuous, personalized training that elevates performance.

Title: Agent Note
Snippet: Automate post-call documentation with AI to save time—delivering concise, consistent, and actionable notes.
Long_description:
Agent Notes Generator is designed to streamline post-call documentation by leveraging LLM technology to automatically summarize customer interactions into concise, professional, and actionable notes. This tool helps customer service teams save time, reduce manual effort, and ensure higher accuracy in capturing key details after every support call or chat.

Instead of agents spending valuable minutes writing lengthy summaries, the system allows them to enter basic details about the interaction and instantly generates a well-structured note. It captures issues raised, troubleshooting steps taken, and resolution outcomes, creating consistent records that are easy to review and share.

Key capabilities include:

Concise summaries that eliminate unnecessary detail while preserving critical information.

Actionable insights, ensuring follow-up steps and outcomes are clearly documented.

Resolution tracking, capturing troubleshooting efforts and escalation paths.

Efficiency gains, reducing time spent on repetitive documentation tasks.

Improved quality, ensuring standardized notes across different agents and teams.

By automating documentation, Agent Notes Generator empowers service teams to focus more on customers and less on paperwork. It drives consistency, improves knowledge-sharing across teams, and helps organizations maintain accurate records for compliance, training, and service improvement.

Title: Email Assist Agent
Snippet: Automate and save time with AI that summarizes emails, lists actions, and drafts responses
Long_description:
The Email Assist Agent is designed to transform how enterprises manage customer emails by leveraging the power of generative AI. It intelligently summarizes lengthy consumer emails into clear, concise insights and extracts key action items, reducing manual effort and improving turnaround times.

When a customer email is received, the agent analyzes the content, identifies critical issues, and generates a structured summary that highlights the most important points. This ensures customer concerns are never overlooked and enables support teams to prioritize tasks effectively. Alongside summarization, it automatically extracts actionable follow-ups, such as delivery updates, redirection requests, or escalation needs, ensuring faster resolution.

To further streamline workflows, the tool generates a draft email response, aligned with organizational tone and standards. This allows agents to quickly review, refine, and send replies—significantly improving both speed and consistency of communication.

The demo showcases real-world use cases, such as logistics updates, redirection requests, or service complaints, where the AI rapidly interprets the customer’s intent and produces actionable next steps. By automating repetitive email analysis and response drafting, the Email Assist Agent empowers teams to save time, handle higher volumes, reduce errors, and deliver superior customer experiences.
